files.description: Standalone verifier script that checks required runtime/_build artifacts exist and are non-empty, then writes runtime/_build/verification_report.json with pass/fail status and per-artifact details.

sts_with_preflight.sh", "scripts/smoke_test.py", "scripts/toy_meta_analysis.py", "scripts/validate_json.py", "scripts/verify_artifacts.py", "scripts/verify_build_artifacts.json", "scripts/verify_build_artifacts.py"]
Summary: Added a standalone artifact verification script that enforces existence and non-emptiness for required build outputs and writes a verification_report.json pass/fail contract.

missionDescription: Add a lightweight artifact verifier that asserts existence + non-emptiness (file size > 0) for runtime/_build/logs/run.log, runtime/_build/manifest.json, runtime/_build/validation/taxonomy_report.json, and runtime/_build/meta_analysis/summary_table.csv and forest_plot.png, and write runtime/_build/verification_report.json. This addresses the audit gap of 0 test/execution results by turning outputs into a pass/fail contract.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
Without a verifier, execution can silently fail or produce empty artifacts; the system needs an automated definition of 'build is healthy.'
